name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Solutions Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in **blockchain**, **DApps**, and **Solidity** development, providing architectural recommendations and technical discovery for high-performance solutions. My robust background in **Rust**, **MOVE**, and pre-sales initiatives equips me to lead product demos and proofs of concept, ensuring customer success through effective commercial negotiations.
In addition to my technical prowess, I bring expertise in full-stack development, leveraging technologies such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, to create enterprise-grade platforms. My experience with **Azure** and **AWS** strengthens my ability to build scalable solutions that incorporate AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and automated processes.
With a solid foundation in microservices architecture, CI/CD automation, and compliance standards including HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, I am committed to delivering secure applications that meet business needs while enabling seamless integration of advanced technologies.
